rule:
Within each

tag, there must be no tag used.
input: Respect builds relationships. Trust is essential. Loyalty binds hearts.
validityText:
The input is a paragraph of text that contains three separate sentences, which are: "Respect builds relationships.", "Trust is essential.", and "Loyalty binds hearts.". This meets the requirement that the input text must contain at least three separate sentences. The input does not consist solely of whitespace characters, and it includes a mix of letters and punctuation. Therefore, it meets all the criteria set forth in the input specification.

OK
coverageEvalText:
The chatbot output has three

tags, which comply with the requirement of having at least three

tags. Each

tag contains a tag as well as multiple tags, which comply with the second requirement of having one tag and multiple tags inside each

tag to emphasize key words and phrases. No violations are detected regarding the compliance with the description provided. The output adheres to the specified format and inclusion of tags as instructed. OK
